Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Composite Shortbow (+5 1d6+1 P [Crit +d10] R60'; dexterity; expert); Light Hammer (+7 1d6+2 B R20'; strength; expert); Pick (+7 1d6+2 P [Crit d10]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +5 (dexterity; expert); Will: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes: Arctic Elf: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +4 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 14 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Charm (A1): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Magic Notes: Supernatural Charm: Knows the Charm arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st rank once per day
